message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate it. I'm willing to pay $95 for the product.
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to sell it to you for $105.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget, I'd like to propose a price of $100 for the product.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. I'm willing to sell it to you for $108.
Thank you for considering my previous offers, Alice. Based on my budget, I would like to propose a final price of $105 for the product.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $105, but I'm not willing to go any lower. I'll sell it to you for $105, but this is my final offer.
